metahub 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

metahub

Lightweight helpers to list, load, and analyze meta-analysis datasets via a registry.

Install (dev) 

devtools::install_github('mahmood789/repo100/metahub')

Quick start 

library(metahub)
head(list_datasets())
fit <- meta_run(load_dataset('metadat_dat.bcg'))
meta_forest(fit)
